meanings.def: coloured liquid for writing, drawing and printing
examples: Be careful. The ink is still wet.
He wrote very neatly in blue ink.
Most people now use ballpoints rather than ink.
The drawback of this printer is that the ink tends to smudge.
There were several alterations in ink.
We need to replace the ink cartridge in the printer.

meanings.def: to cover something with ink so that it can be used for printing
to sign a document, especially a contract
examples: The group has just inked a $10 million deal.
